citation.article-title: Zobellella aerophila sp. nov., isolated from seashore sand, and emended description of the genus Zobellella
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the genus Zobellella
The description of the genus is as given previously (Lin & Shieh, 2006) but with the following amendments.
Requires NaCl for growth or for growth stimulation.
Major polar lipids are PE and PG.
Major fatty acids are summed feature 3 (C16 : 1ω6c and/or C16 : 1ω7c), summed feature 8 (C18 : 1ω6c and/or C18 : 1ω7c) and C16 : 0.
The G+C content of the genomic DNA is 59–64 mol%.
